info.name: Coding Events API
info.description: REST API for managing Coding Events

response.name: List of public Coding Event data

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

response.name:
List of Tags associated with the Coding Event
Public: links.tag, links.codingEvents
Owners: includes links.add and links.remove

item.name: Retrieve Coding Events with the given Tag

response.name: Coding Events
Invalid or missing Coding Event data
Returns new public Coding Event data

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

response.name: User is already a Member or Owner

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

request.description: Requires an authenticated Member or Owner of the Coding Event

response.name:
Complete Coding Event data with links available to the requesting Member's Role.
Member Role: links.leave.
Owner Role: links.cancel
Not a Member of the Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

response.name:
List of Tags associated with the Coding Event
Public: links.tag, links.codingEvents
Owners: includes links.add and links.remove

item.name: Retrieve Members of the Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

request.description:
Requires an authenticated Member.
The Member data will differ depending on the requesting Member's Role

response.name:
List of Members with data dependent on the requesting Member's Role.
Member Role: limited data (username and role).
Owner Role: complete data (username, role, email, and links.remove)
Not a Member of the Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event
(Required) The ID of the Coding Event

request.description: Requires an authenticated Owner of the Coding Event

response.name: Not an Owner of the Coding Event

item.name: Add a Tag to a Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

response.name: Tag can not be associated with the Coding Event (not found or already associated)
Not an Owner of the Coding Event

item.name: Remove a Tag from a Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event

response.name: Not an Owner of the Coding Event
Tag can not be removed from the Coding Event (not found or not associated)

item.name: Remove a Member from a Coding Event

variable.description: (Required) The ID of the Coding Event
